name: Orion Destiny
description:
More than 500 years passed from the beginning of "The War of Rebirth", two races territorially fighting for a planet called Orion. Join Arthan and his friends in an exciting adventure, full of twists and surprises.

Details:
  • Title: Orion Destiny.
  • Playtime: 30+ hours
  • Genre: Turn based JRPG, adventure.
  • Game engine: RPG Maker MV
  • Developer: Aethersoft
  • Lenguages: English, Spanish
Features:
  • More than 30 hours of gameplay.
  • A massive world to explore.
  • A lot of sidequests and hunts.
  • Classic turn based combat with a lot of twists.
  • Beautiful and detailed graphics.
  • More than 100 skills to learn.
  • More than 100 monsters to fight.
